title: CSS Grid Layout
short_description: Master the power of CSS grid layout to create complex and responsive web designs.

title: JavaScript Frameworks
short_description: Explore popular JavaScript frameworks and libraries for building modern web applications.
long_description: This course covers frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js, and teaches you how to leverage their features to build dynamic and interactive web applications.
author: Jennifer Smith

title: Server-Side Web Development with Node.js
short_description: Learn how to build server-side web applications using Node.js and Express.js.
long_description: In this course, you'll learn how to use Node.js and Express.js to build scalable and efficient web applications on the server side.
author: Mark Thompson

title: Introduction to Database Design
short_description: Learn the fundamentals of database design and management for web applications.
long_description: This course covers the basics of database design, normalization, SQL querying, and working with popular database management systems like MySQL and PostgreSQL.
author: Jessica Davis

title: Responsive Web Design with Bootstrap
short_description: Learn how to use the Bootstrap framework to create responsive and mobile-first web designs.
long_description: In this course, you'll learn how to leverage the power of Bootstrap to build responsive websites and user interfaces that adapt to different screen sizes.
author: Kevin Johnson

title: Building RESTful APIs with Express.js
short_description: Learn how to design and build RESTful APIs using Express.js and MongoDB.
long_description: This course teaches you how to create RESTful APIs using Express.js and interact with a MongoDB database to perform CRUD operations.
author: Alex Johnson

title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts
short_description: Take your JavaScript skills to the next level with advanced concepts and techniques.
long_description: In this course, you'll dive deep into advanced JavaScript topics such as closures, prototypes, asynchronous programming, and more.
author: Samantha Lee

title: Introduction to Front-End Frameworks
short_description: Learn the basics of popular front-end frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js.
long_description: This course provides an introduction to front-end frameworks, teaching you how to build modern and interactive user interfaces using React, Angular, and Vue.js.
author: Daniel Williams

title: Introduction to Back-End Development
short_description: Learn the fundamentals of back-end development and build server-side applications.
long_description: This course introduces you to back-end development concepts and technologies, covering topics like server-side programming, databases, and API development.
author: Michelle Thompson

title: User Experience (UX) Design
short_description: Learn how to design intuitive and user-friendly web experiences.
long_description: In this course, you'll learn the principles of user experience (UX) design and how to apply them to create engaging and effective web designs.
author: Rachel Davis

title: Building Scalable Web Applications
short_description: Learn techniques and best practices for building scalable and high-performance web applications.
long_description: This course covers architectural patterns, caching strategies, performance optimization, and other techniques for building scalable web applications that can handle high traffic loads.
author: Andrew Johnson

title: Introduction to Web Accessibility
short_description: Learn how to design and develop web applications that are accessible to all users.
long_description: In this course, you'll learn about web accessibility standards and techniques for ensuring that your web applications can be used by people with disabilities.
author: Sophia Johnson

title: Web Design Principles
short_description: Learn the fundamental principles of web design and create visually appealing websites.
long_description: This course covers design principles, color theory, typography, layout, and other essential concepts for creating aesthetically pleasing and effective web designs.
author: Olivia Smith

title: Building E-Commerce Websites
short_description: Learn how to build secure and functional e-commerce websites using popular platforms.
long_description: In this course, you'll learn how to create e-commerce websites using platforms like WooCommerce, Shopify, or Magento, and integrate payment gateways to enable online transactions.
author: Daniel Johnson
